And add the padded headrest to protect the cervical spine. Making you feel comfortable even if sitting for hours.
✨【High-Quality Durable Leather Office Chair】 The black chair uses high-quality faux leather, soft and comfortable, which is wear-resistant and durable, with a longer service life.

🎁【Suitable for Multiple Scenarios 】Big and tall leather office chair gives you a better sitting experience. 3.8 inch adjustable height design and mid-century modern style, which is suitable for tables of different heights, and suitable for multiple Scenarios such as study room、office and bedroom.

🔧【Easy to Assembly & Worry-Free Warranty】In order to assemble a executive office chair as easily as possible, we provide very clear and detailed instructions, numbered parts, and all necessary tools in the package. And providing 30 days no reason to return the office chair to protect your rights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels & looks great
reviews.reviewText: Yes it feels as good to sit in as it is to look atCan't beat the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this office chair for a while now and wanted to finally post a few of my thoughts on this product. I’ve sat in a lot of chairs of this sort over the years so it’s not too special in regard to being phenomenal. I like that it’s a mid-back support so it’s not pushing on the back of your head. Mine however feels as if it’s got a bit of a lean to the right (not by a lot) but enough to notice. I’ve used it for remote work at home at my workstation and sitting in it for 8 straight hours was good too as to where some other chairs can make you sore.I’m a bigger guy myself so the width of it from armrest to armrest is perfect for me. You can lean back in it or lock it so that it doesn’t lean back as with most chairs in this category. The height adjustment is effortless and it’s perfect under my desk when I scoot it in. I honestly thought this chair was going to fall apart after a few months of use but almost a year later it’s been holding up nicely. The cushioning is nice as well so I would recommend this for bigger people as well if you need something wide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks pretty but I’ve had this desk chair for my work from home set up for about four months now and it is not comfortable. The seat leans forward so you’re always sitting on the edge having to slide back. If you need a chair for multiple hours of use daily, find a different one. It’s pretty but not worth the back/spine pain in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: * Exceptional Delivery Timeframe to Alaska* Excellent customer service* Easy to assemble* Not big or small, good size for most peopleTheir team reached out to make sure everything went well, which it did. I haven't used the chair for more than a week but so far the officer's of my vessel are happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not come with all equipment
reviews.reviewText: Several of the screws were missing and so was the wrench. The screws that were there were just dumped into the box (no bag). There’s 2 different kinds but none are labeled or separated. There also wasn’t a wrench included.The chair itself also feels kind of cheap for the price. I will have to return mine since I can’t even put it all together due to missing screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made chair and very comfortable,.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice compact office chair. It roll easily with the 5 wheels and is easy to push around. The upholstery is a nice quality and is well padded and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional chair without a lot of frills; needed to buy padding for arms
reviews.reviewText: It was not fun putting this together, but once put together it's a functional office chair capable of accommodating a tall adult. I picked this up for my son, who at 6' is not THAT tall but tall enough, and like many folks he is still working from home...and sitting in his chair all day, every day. The adjustable recline is a good feature. The armrests are not incredibly comfortable, which you. might guess from the picture, but we weren't expecting it to be quite as uncomfortable as it is - I feel like the flat design might have been an aesthetic choice rather than a rolled one, which might have gone easier on the arms. We've fitted ours out with some arm pads for office chairs, which goes a long way to making these usable for hours at a stretch but at an additional cost of about $30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a big guy chair
reviews.reviewText: Definitely not as wide as I thought it would be. Thankfully my wife can use it.
